name: Nazareno Runner Semana Santa
summary: Nazareno Runner it's a game based on the Spanish version of Easter week where you have to make your character run across the city in order to get in time to your brotherhood. Help citizens along the way, make them follow you, avoid pits in the road as well as angry by-passers and drones. Get coins to unlock extra characters, extras and blessings. This humoristic game aims to join people in these holidays with respect and without a religious bias. Get your toasts ready and make your character go as far as possible!
